questions.question: What was it like meeting and working with Pablo Escobar, the leader of the Medellín Cartel?
What was it like to fly, maybe describe the details of, do you have to fly low?
Is there details that are unique to this experience of flying an airplane with drugs on it, on board?
What would you say from your best understanding of what was the relationship between Bill Clinton and Barry Seal?
What was the alleged involvement of the CIA in using drug trade to fund things?
Can you tell the story of when you were tortured nearly to death in a Mexican prison?
So what stands out to you as the most difficult or miraculous escape in the bunch?
I ran every day and like I told you, why do you run so, Roger?
Do you regret the drug smuggling that took you away from the woman you love?
Do you think it's all predetermined or do you think we make our own choices?
